main.name: Atharva Shinde
main.description: I am a PSE Intern, Frontend Dev, Blockchain, DevOps, Product & Startup Enthusiast
main.bio: Hello! I am Atharva. I am a React Developer and working as an React Intern @FusionTech. I am pursuing my Bachlor's of Engineering in Information Technology. I am a Blockchain, Crypto & Cyber Security Enthusiast and have been working on DApps. I am also an Active Investor & Trader. Apart from this, My leisure activities include Trekking, Cycling, Reading & playing Guitar.

education.school: Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Versova - Mumbai University
education.degree: Bachelor's of Engineering in Information Technology
education.description: Pursuing my Bachelor's in IT with 8.5 CGPA

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
